about_the_game:
The artbook for Our Life: Beginnings & Always! Nearly 300 pages featuring character sprites, CG images, backgrounds, cut-in images, sketches, and more!

Credits:
Addrossi: Main Sprites, Main CGs, & Main Promo Images
J. Herschler: Additional CGs
Lilirulu: Additional CGs, Additional Character Sprite Layers, Cut-In Images, & Promo Images
Hui: Additional CGs
Nancy Chen: Additional Character Sprite Layers
Vui Huynh: Main Backgrounds
LeeThien: Additional Backgrounds
BackgroundTK: Additional Backgrounds
Enkiirin: Additional Backgrounds
Keira: Cut-In Images
blistered/rei: Logo
Winter Mochie: Interface Screens
Re.Alice: Interface Screens
sirenofthebar: Main Character Doll
Mell Nguyen: Character Design Sketches & Promo Images
Nekonomicon: Animation Effects
Red Riding Heart: Guest Art Promo Piece
cmykae​: Artbook Designer
